title: Modern guide to health
creator_credit: Halas and Batchelor Cartoon Films, John Halas and Joy Batchelor
brief_description: This humorous cartoon by England’s top animation artists, Joy Batchelor and John Halas, deals with general health problems which we all meet in everyday life.
